Class DefaultCritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultCritter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Critter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Missile, PowerUp, Shooter, StarBackground

    public class DefaultCritter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Critter
    DefaultCritter is the base class for all of the entities that will be created and used in the Cosmic-Conquistadors game, this class implements the Critter interface which gives it the methods to change the coordinates, velocities and radius of the entity.
    Author:
    Bradley Fourie, Heinrich Benz, Daniel Banks
    See Also:
    Critter, Enemy, Shooter, Missile

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultCritter

        public DefaultCritter(double xCoord,
                      double yCoord,
                      double xVelocity,
                      double yVelocity,
                      double radius)
        Constructor that creates the entity using the variables needed to specify the position, movement and radius of the entity
        Parameters:
        xCoord - the x-coordinate the entity is to be initialised at
        yCoord - the y-coordinate the entity is to be initialised at
        xVelocity - the x-velocity of the entity
        yVelocity - the y-velocity of the entity
        radius - the radius or "size" of the entity
